title: 【海潮搬运】Minecraft City —— 我的城市
author: 海潮
txt_content:
本帖最后由 海潮 于 2015-5-21 18:48 编辑 
yoooooooooo

这里是海潮。
本来说好的要潜水一辈子的，但是Red的Remx站出来说——海潮你怎么能这个样子？我舍不得你啊2333！
以图为证！


于是海潮决定
发完这个帖子。
就...


回来

这个是从PMC上见到的，有着现代风格，虽然有很多创世神操作痕迹，但总体布局还是能称作良好上乘.

机场



走道



议会



海岸线



是不是感受到浓浓的现代风了呢？赶快下载吧！

作者简介：
This here is my super amazing city project 5000!!! Ok, maybe not so. But it is my city project. And I love it to bits. This project started somewhere in september 2014, and I have no clue whatso ever when it will be done. But when I do finish it, the city will contain an Airport, downtown, a harbor, neighborhoods, maybe some mountains. I think it will be amazing at the end. What do you think? 


You can use this for your needs, (maps, servers, machinimas ect.) Just give the basic info and/or a link to this page. 

If you want to add something, anything really to the city, please do. If you have a building, a bridge, a house (for future suburban areas) you can send me the world folder, and I may add it. No cars, no, I will not be adding any cars to the city. It will make it hard to work with the plan I have for the city. Anything else, please do. 

Please diamond, favorite, and subscribe. Post your opinion, give out ideas. =D 

If you want a specific part of the city to be worked on, Say so. Also if you think you have a better name for the city, then Post it in the comments. 


海潮翻译：
这这是我的城市，简称Minecraft City ! ! !好吧,也许不是这样这个项目在2014年9月开始。经过多月的努力终于完工了，现在分享给大家。这座城市包含机场，市区中心，大山，村庄。我认为他是我的得意之作。不知阁下怎么认为？也请大家多多支持我，同时欢迎各位评论文章！





下载地址：
http://yunpan.cn/cwsqxJm8pZKGj  访问密码 c9b4

如果大家喜欢这些作品，请去原帖支持作者！
如果想搬运作品，但是翻不了墙，海潮可以帮你们搬运.

抵制头衔刷屏从我做起！
@simon3000

replies.txt_content:
This here is my super amazing city project 5000!!! Ok, maybe not so. But it is my city project. And I love it to bits. This project started somewhere in september 2014, and I have no clue whatso ever when it will be done. But when I do finish it, the city will contain an Airport, downtown, a harbor, neighborhoods, maybe some mountains. I think it will be amazing at the end. What do you think?        这是我的超级神奇的城市项目5000 ! ! !好吧,也许不是这样。但这是我的城市的项目。,我爱它。这个项目在2014年9月开始,和我不知道不论什么时候会完成。但当我完成它,这座城市将包含一个机场,市中心,港口,社区,也许一些山脉。我认为这将是惊人的。你怎么认为?
　　
　　
　　这个项目都是由我来完成的,只有我。我只是人类,我想,所以不要期望纯史诗黄金,立即回复吧！
